Compro Examination

Compro Examination is the Civil Service Commission Promotional (COMPRO) Examination conducted to help workers in civil service gain promotions. The COMPRO Exam qualifies workers or proofs workers worthy of promotion in civil service.

All civil service workers who desire promotion in the civil service are expected to participate in the Compulsory Confirmation Promotion (COMPRO) Examination

How to register for COMPRO Examination

As a civil service worker, you are requiring to apply for the COMPRO examination for your promotion.

To register for COMPRO Examination,

  • First visit https://comproexam.online/
  • Click on Begin Registration
  • Select your Exam based on your Grade Level (GL-07 – Senior Compro Exam, and GL-06- Junior Compro Exam)
  • Fill the form and Submit online with a valid Passport.

First visit OFFICE OF THE HEAD OF THE CIVIL SERVICE OF THE FEDERATION (OHCSF)-HQTRS to collect the hard copy of the form

You can click here to download the form.

How to pay for COMPRO Examination Fee

After you have received and filled the Compro form collected from OHCSF Hqtrs, proceed to pay for the examination.

To pay for COMPRO Examination, follow the steps below;

  • Go to remita.net
  • Click Pay TSA & States
  • Select FGN
  • In the field, what do you want to do?, type OFFICE OF THE HEAD OF THE CIVIL SERVICE OF THE FEDERATION (OHCSF)-HQTRS
  • Name of Service/Purpose, Select COMPRO EXAMINATION
  • Description: Type COMPRO EXAMINATION Registration fee
  • Amount: type 3000
  • Name: Type your full name correctly
  • Phone No.: Enter a correct phone number
  • Email: Enter correct Email
  • Submit

How to Submit COMPRO Registration Form

  • Fill all forms
  • Attach Uniform Passport
  • Attach a copy of the Remita Payment Receipt/Slip
  • Submit same to the OFFICE OF THE HEAD OF THE CIVIL SERVICE OF THE FEDERATION (OHCSF)-HQTRS.

COMPRO Examination Screening Date for Junior Level – GL-03-06

Tuesday 13th September, – Friday 16th September 2024

COMPRO Examination Screening Centres/Venues

The approved venues for the Examination in the State capitals are the State Police Commands, while the venues for the Federal Capital Territory, Abuja, are as follows:

  1. Public Service Institute of Nigeria (PSIN), Abuja;
  2. Police Officers Wives Association (POWA), Primary School, Area 11, Garki, Abuja;
  3. Model Secondary School, Maitama, Abuja;
  4. Government Secondary School, Tundun Wada, Wuse Zone 4, Abuja;
  5. Government Secondary School, Area 10, Garki, Abuja;
  6. Government Secondary School, Wuse Zone 3, Abuja.

Documents Needed for COMPRO Accreditation:

  • COMPRO Application Form
  • COMPRO Remita Payment Receipt
  • Appointment Letter
  • Passport showing Uniform of service
  • Service Number
  • File Number
  • Complete Uniform to be worn during the examination.

How to Prepare for Civil Service Promotion Examination

Read all materials, Past questions and other relevant materials

Compro II examination questions will cover questions set from the following areas;

Features of Civil Service Commission Promotional (COMPRO)

  • English Language
  • Public Service Rules
  • Financial Regulations
  • General Paper
  • Office Routine or Special Paper
  • Compro Past Questions Financial Regulations
  • Compro Past Questions General Paper
  • Current Affairs
  • Compro Past Questions Common Law
  • Verbal Reasoning
  • Numerical Reasoning

Read Also>>>COMPRO PAST Questions and Answers (Prepared) | Civil Service Commission

Are you in need of COMPRO past questions and answers, drop your email and instructions on how to download COMPRO Past questions and answers will be sent to you.

Good luck.

How do I pay for Compro Exam?

HOW TO PAY FOR COMPRO EXAMINATION FEE

Go to remita.net.
Click Pay TSA & States.
Select FGN.
In the field, what do you want to do? ...
Name of Service/Purpose, Select COMPRO EXAMINATION.
Description: Enter COMPRO EXAMINATION Registration fee.
Amount: Enter N5,000.
Name: Enter your full name correctly.

What is COMPRO

The abbreviation for COMPRO is simply Combined Confirmation Promotion (COMPRO) Examination.

Where can I purchase COMPRO Examination Form?

The COMPRO examination form can be purchased online. As a civil service worker, you are requiring to apply for the COMPRO examination for your promotion. To purchase the COMPRO Examination, visit https://comproexam.online/

Documents Needed for COMPRO Accreditation:

Documents Needed for COMPRO Accreditation:
COMPRO Application Form
COMPRO Remita Payment Receipt
Appointment Letter
Passport showing Uniform of service
Service Number
File Number
Complete Uniform to be worn during the examination.
https://applyjobs.org.ng
